account.activeConsErrorDesc: Your account is already using the max amount of connections.
account.expiredErrorDesc: Your account is expired, you don't have access to this.

live.activityIndicatorText: %s Categories left to load, obtained %s Channels in total, this might take a while...
live.filterChannelsNotFound: No results found! Default to full list.
live.noCategoriesErrorDesc:
No Categories/Channels found! 
 Could be an error on the Server, or you don't have access to this.

liveChannel.activityIndicatorText: Loading Channel Information, this might take a while...
liveChannel.epgNotFound: No EPG found for this channel...
liveChannel.message:
Do you have any other Media Players installed?

If so, press YES and pick your player. (WARNING: for iOS, it will only work with VLC.)

Pressing NO will launch the integrated player in the app, keep in mind IT DOES NOT handle subtitles and it is very experimental on both iOS and Android.

Pressing outside of this box cancels opening.
liveChannel.title: Pick a player

login.toastError: Something went wrong during the Login Stage!
login.wifiWarningDesc: The use of WiFi with this application is very recommended!

Do you have any other Media Players installed?

If so, press YES and pick your player. (WARNING: for iOS, it will only work with VLC.)

Pressing NO will launch the integrated player in the app, keep in mind IT DOES NOT handle subtitles and it is very experimental on both iOS and Android.

Pressing outside of this box cancels opening.
